media:content.media:title: Indian security personnel at the site of the attack in Baisaran near Pahalgam

Baisaran, 6 km from Pahalgam, is accessible only on foot or by pony. The meadow is ringed by the densely forested Pir Panjalmountains that stretch far, toward Kokernag and Kishtwar to the south and Balatal and Sonamarg to the north.
